title: China Enlists AI To Sniff Out Corruption In Public Bidding
summary_full: China wants to use artificial intelligence in public tendering and bidding to guard against backroom deals and corruption, according to guidelines released, just as President Xi Jinping's years-long corruption purge intensifies.
